name: INNEX
goal:
Sviluppo e commercializzazione di Dispositivi di Protezione Individuale innovativi per la protezione del corpo e dei piedi, con particolare attenzione al comfort e alla specializzazione funzionale. Abbigliamento da lavoro e protettivo e calzature di sicurezza.

Design and sales of innovative Personal Protective Equipements (PPE) for body protection and feet, with particular attention paid to the comfort and operational specialization. Workwear and protective clothings and safety shoes.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Expert for the product innovation and technologic transfer for the following sectors: safety at work, consumer goods industry. Participant to the foundation of the European Footwear Technologic Platform coordinating the Product Innovation Working Group. Participant to the cross tech. platform Consumer Goods CONXEPT.
Several participation to R&D projects in the FP 7Â° and in Horizon 2020.
